summary: Enb with Fantasy colours , with sweet fx for 0.168, Middle pc
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-UCrPqMZ8MIo/UeiLxXkg8XI/AAAAAAAAAWE/-KxOAss8Bro/w520-h61-no/hip.png[/img][/center]

[center][color=#dda0dd][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=6]HighPitched Nexus Remix Enb[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][color=#dda0dd][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=6][img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-G2QIbHrPZZY/UaDC40GdnFI/AAAAAAAAAM8/k_hIpC_UhyA/w962-h601-no/ScreenShot84+%5BHDTV+%281080%29%5D.jpg[/img][/size][/font][/color][/center]
 
[center][color=#ee82ee][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=5]Hello This is my first file to the nexus comunity. Im not english, so escuse me for write with error.
I work on it for fun, since 1 years so i decide to publish it .[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[center][color=#ee82ee][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=5]This is a vibrant enb, colorfull, not realstic, the sun is a big red star, the sky is a beautiful artificial blue silk.[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][color=#dda0dd][size=5][img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-oIaOvlN5B6o/UaDCusotucI/AAAAAAAAAHk/XGOidKhfh18/w1089-h681-no/ScreenShot50+[HDTV+(1080)].jpg[/img][/size][/color][/font][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][color=#ee82ee][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=5]Enb with Fantasy colours a lot ^^ , with sweet fx (shader,hdr,dither,SMAA) more vibrant scenery.[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[center][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=5][color=#ee82ee]Its designed for Enb 0.168 with or without SSAO (optional file include)[/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=5][color=#ee82ee]Its run on Middle end pc.[/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][size=5][color=#ee82ee][img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-C4gaxvOapEA/UaDC1-vIIeI/AAAAAAAAAIE/Eb59xKo37MI/w1089-h681-no/ScreenShot78+[HDTV+(1080)].jpg[/img][/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][size=5][color=#ee82ee][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif]I know it is not the taste of everyone,[/font][/color][/size][/center]
[center][size=5][color=#ee82ee][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif]I hope you enjoy[/font][/color][/size][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-9EyooIVvr5I/Uayill62CeI/AAAAAAAAALQ/xmeSWN-f1Xw/w1080-h675-no/2_10.jpg[/img][/center]
[center] [/center]
[size=6]
[center][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][color=yellow]IMPORTANT:[/color][/font][/center]
[center][font=\'lucida sans unicode\', \'lucida grande\', sans-serif][color=yellow]You MUST install Climates of Tamriel , with dark night, or the sun is too big
and Enhanced Lights and FX & ELFXEnhancer.esp & ELFX - Exteriors.esp (link below)[/color][/font][/center][/size]

[center][i][color=#ffa500][u][size=5][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Recommended mod[/font][/size][/u][/color][/i][/center]
[center] [/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Climates Of Tamriel[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Enhanced Lights and FX[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25675/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Lightning during Thunder Storms[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4955/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]83Willows 101BugsHD Butterfly Dragonfly Luna-Moth Torchbug[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3621/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23771/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]skyBirds - Airborne Perching Birds[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17723/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Birds of Skyrim[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5084/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Bryce Nebula - Skyrim galaxy replacer[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7405/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Quality SnowFlakes HD V2[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13466/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]RIS - Real Ice and Snow[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14227/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Ruins Clutter Improved[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12110/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Beautiful Whiterun[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18818/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Blacksmithforge water fix[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29782/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]HD Enhanced Terrain[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7484/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Sexy Winterhold College[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37256/?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Superior Rock Textures - Hiqh Quality HD 2K[/font][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655//?][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/font][/url][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-7RAteVI9wXw/Uegn1YvP10I/AAAAAAAAAVg/g1KFnX3-57c/w1080-h675-no/3309272-1359402397.jpg[/img][/center]
 
 
 [color=#ff0000][size=6][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Installation:[/font][/size][/color]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]NOTE: ENB MUST be installed manually; it is NOT compatible with any mod manager.[/font]
 
[color=#ff8c00][size=5][u][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Prior to Installation[/font][/u][/size][/color]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]-Calibrate your monitor(s). [url=http://www.lagom.nl/lcd-test/]Lagom [/url]is great for LCD displays. For laptop users with limited controls use the Windows tool:[/font]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Contol Panel >> Color Management >> Advance tab >> Calibrate display[/font]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]-Make sure your graphic drivers are up to date. If not, please download and install new drivers via a clean installation.
Better on Nvidia is  314.22 WHQL Drivers
All latest 320.xx drivers are breaking some ENB effects = thx Kyo[/font]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]-Download the ENB  [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0168.htm]here[/url].[/font]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Save the folder you just downloaded on your desktop.[/font]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]-Back up your game INIs. These are the \"Skyrim.ini\" and \"SkyimPrefs.ini\", located in your \"My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\" folder.[/font]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Back up your game saves located in your \"My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\" folder.[/font]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]-Extract the d3d9.dll file into your root Skyrim folder. You do not need any other files except the d3d9.dll. Most ENBs use the Wrapper version . Do not extract the file to the Data folder![/font]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]It must be placed the root Skyrim folder to work.[/font]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Extract the ENB files folder \"Skyrim main folder\" into your root Skyrim folder. The same place the d3d9.dll file has been extracted to.[/font]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Edit your game INI file as shown below.[/font]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Game INIs[/font]
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]For ENB to work as intended, you will have to make some modifications in your game INIs.[/font]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]In your \"SkyrimPrefs.ini\", set the following in the [Display] section:[/font]
 
 
[code]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
fGamma=1.0000 //this normalizes the gamma so the ENB coloring isn\'t off
iMultiSample=0 //turns off multi-sampling AA
bTransparencyMultisampling=0 //turns off multi-sampling transparency AA[/code]
 
[font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Turn off MSAA[/font]
 
[i][size=1][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Source:Step[/font][/size][/i]
 
[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-jMea39IhIcc/UaDCwp17kYI/AAAAAAAAAHs/AIOkXRfiNdY/w1080-h675-no/ScreenShot55+%255BHDTV+%25281080%2529%255D.jpg[/img]
 
[center][size=5][color=#ffd700][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Optional:[/font][/color][/size][/center]
[center][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]I have put a folder called mod & pref,[/font][/center]
[center][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]The ini file, is just for you see what is my setting if you want an exemple[/font][/center]
[center][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]and the plugin.txt its the plugin i use.[/font][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Also I have put some of variant version for performance and with or without patch choose what you want.[/font][/center]

 
[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-eL79N0gqzyc/UcGCeyyVUyI/AAAAAAAAARY/QL_IgCGIw2M/w1080-h675-no/ScreenShot52+%5BHDTV+%281080%29%5D.jpg[/img]


[color=#ee82ee][size=5][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]GREETING[/font][/size][/color]
its a mix of tweak i found on nexus and some by me.
all the credit and effort goes to : Kyo , Pygothian, M. A. T. S. O, Boris Vorontsov, HeliosDoubleSix, gp65cj04,JawZ,jjc71,CeeJay.dk, Bronze316 ... tell me if i miss you.
author: HighPitcheMcFly

files.name: HighPitched Enb
files.changelogHtml: Upload different version and now with normal size sun
